column4: I'm using ubuntu on a thinkpad x30, which replaced debian. the thinkpad x30 has an integral CF reader - " CardBus bridge: Ricoh Co Ltd RL5c476 II" according to lspci. It has worked before using yenta_socket and usb mass storage, but now when I insert my CF cards, no drives are displayed and dmesg only displays: "pccard: card ejected from slot 1<cr>pccard: PCMCIA card inserted into slot 1" - whereas previously it'd also display which device
its been assigned to. I can still use USB flash drives just fine. what might be my issue?
